billEvents.eventText: referred to corporations, authorities and commissions

title: Authorizes the Urban Development Corporation to create a subsidiary corporation for the oversight of the Atlantic Yards project
summary: Authorizes the Urban Development Corporation to create a subsidiary corporation for the purpose of the further planning, design, and oversight of the Atlantic Yards land use improvement and civic project.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to creating a subsidiary corporation for the planning and oversight of the Atlantic yards project
